doc:
Georges Rivière https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georges_Rivi%C3%A8re 0 Georges Rivière (born 1 July 1924) is a French actor who worked in Argentine cinema in the 1950s. He appeared in nearly 50 films between 1948 and 1970. Georges_Rivière ( born 1_July_1924 ) is a_French_actor who worked in Argentine_cinema in the_1950s . He appeared in nearly_50_films between 1948_and_1970 .
